name: MCV390 Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Product Design
description: Develop a context for new product design. The course begins with a fundamental understanding of an ideal system and the opportunities for improvement in real life systems. Overview of air conditioning system components and their selection criteria. Integration of these components into a product design using case studies of indigenously developed products for Indian Railways and Telecom industry. The course will enable students to look at what goes into preparing a comprehensive input for a new design and the process used to validate the design from prototype to commercial production.
